CustomField.description: A fee assessed to recover the statutory fee for administering the Public Utility Regulatory Act. The PUCA is currently set at .1667% of a customer’s total energy charge for a given billing cycle (including all TDU/TDSP fees), before sales tax. Checking this adds tax to plan details.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A fee assessed to recover the statutory fee for administering the Public Utility Regulatory Act. Currently set at .1667% of a customer’s energy charge for a given billing cycle (including all TDU/TDSP fees), before sales tax. Check box to add to plan.
